from __future__ import annotations

import importlib.util
import json
import sys
from pathlib import Path


def _load_cli_module():
    root = Path(__file__).resolve().parents[1]
    cli_path = root / "scripts" / "elephant_cli.py"
    spec = importlib.util.spec_from_file_location("elephant_cli_local", cli_path)
    if spec is None or spec.loader is None:
        raise RuntimeError("Unable to load scripts/elephant_cli.py")
    module = importlib.util.module_from_spec(spec)
    sys.modules[spec.name] = module
    spec.loader.exec_module(module)
    return module


def _load_runner_module():
    root = Path(__file__).resolve().parents[1]
    runner_path = root / "scripts" / "benchmark_runner.py"
    spec = importlib.util.spec_from_file_location("benchmark_runner_local", runner_path)
    if spec is None or spec.loader is None:
        raise RuntimeError("Unable to load scripts/benchmark_runner.py")
    module = importlib.util.module_from_spec(spec)
    sys.modules[spec.name] = module
    spec.loader.exec_module(module)
    return module


elephant_cli = _load_cli_module()
benchmark_runner = _load_runner_module()


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_maps_slash_commands():
    parts = ["/plan", "--task", "add feature"]
    rewritten = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert rewritten[0] == "plan"
    assert rewritten[1:] == ["--task", "add feature"]


def test_rewrite_interactive_command_parts_preserves_flags():
    parts = ["/code", "--output", "json", "--task", "refactor"]
    rewritten = elephant_cli._rewrite_interactive_command_parts(parts)
    assert rewritten[0] == "code"
    assert "--output" in rewritten
    assert "json" in rewritten
    assert "--task" in rewritten
    assert "refactor" in rewritten


def test_session_log_path_sanitizes_session_id():
    root = Path("/tmp")
    session_id = "test session/with\\bad:chars*"
    log_path = benchmark_runner._session_log_path(root, session_id)
    assert "test_session" in log_path.name
    assert "with" in log_path.name
    assert "bad" in log_path.name
    assert "chars" in log_path.name
    assert "_" in log_path.name
    assert log_path.suffix == ".jsonl"


def test_append_session_event_writes_jsonl(tmp_path: Path):
    session_id = "test_session"
    elephant_cli.ensure_project_layout(tmp_path)
    elephant_cli._append_session_event(tmp_path, session_id, "user", "hello")
    log_path = benchmark_runner._session_log_path(tmp_path, session_id)
    assert log_path.exists()
    line = log_path.read_text(encoding="utf-8").strip()
    record = json.loads(line)
    assert record["role"] == "user"
    assert record["content"] == "hello"
    assert "timestamp" in record


def test_load_session_context_returns_empty_for_missing_session(tmp_path: Path):
    session_id = "missing_session"
    elephant_cli.ensure_project_layout(tmp_path)
    ctx = elephant_cli._load_session_context(tmp_path, session_id)
    assert ctx[0] == ""
    assert ctx[1] == {}


def test_load_session_context_reconstructs_turns(tmp_path: Path):
    session_id = "history_session"
    elephant_cli.ensure_project_layout(tmp_path)
    elephant_cli._append_session_event(tmp_path, session_id, "user", "first")
    elephant_cli._append_session_event(tmp_path, session_id, "assistant", "second")
    prompt, context = elephant_cli._load_session_context(tmp_path, session_id)
    assert "user" in prompt
    assert "first" in prompt
    assert "assistant" in prompt
    assert "second" in prompt
    assert context.get("turns_count") == 2


def test_run_session_command_routing(tmp_path: Path, monkeypatch):
    (tmp_path / "pyproject.toml").write_text("[project]\nname='tmp'\n", encoding="utf-8")
    monkeypatch.setenv("ELEPHANT_PROJECT_ROOT", str(tmp_path))
    args = elephant_cli._parse(["session", "--cwd", str(tmp_path)])
    assert args.command == "session"


def test_session_event_order_preserved(tmp_path: Path):
    session_id = "ordered_session"
    elephant_cli.ensure_project_layout(tmp_path)
    elephant_cli._append_session_event(tmp_path, session_id, "user", "A")
    elephant_cli._append_session_event(tmp_path, session_id, "assistant", "B")
    elephant_cli._append_session_event(tmp_path, session_id, "user", "C")
    log_path = benchmark_runner._session_log_path(tmp_path, session_id)
    lines = log_path.read_text(encoding="utf-8").strip().splitlines()
    assert len(lines) == 3
    assert json.loads(lines[0])["content"] == "A"
    assert json.loads(lines[1])["content"] == "B"
    assert json.loads(lines[2])["content"] == "C"
